ValidationRule.description: IRS Notice Date and IRS Due Date are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(ESR_Team__c,'Dedicated Service'), ISPICKVAL(Action__c,'Transferred to Amendments'), ISPICKVAL(ESR_Amendment_Type__c,'IRS Notice'), OR( ISBLANK(ESR_IRS_Notice_Date__c), ISBLANK(ESR_IRS_Due_Date__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: IRS Notice Date and IRS Due Date are required
